name: Friendly Corp
description:
Instructions:

- WASD: Move

- Left Click: Grab

- Escape: Quit

- E: Sacrifice creatures (when close to monster)

Satisfy the monster to delay its inevitable arrival. Run around "friendly corp" and grab your favourite employees to deliver some delish food to the monster. Score big by carrying more employee's but be careful with the ever decreasing time every time you offer them to the monster.
